header.name: Locked Containers
header.description:
Allows for locking chests, barrels, and shulker boxes by renaming the container to 'Lock: <player1, player2 ...>' before placing it.
Players must include their own username when renaming, otherwise placing of the container will be blocked.
Also prevents those containers from being destroyed in an explosion. Explosions near locked containers are canceled, so this has the side effect of protecting the area from creepers and TNT explosions.

Double chests are blocked from creation unless the names of both chests match.

Server admins can override locks.
Requires Experiments->Beta APIs to be turned on.
